nodes.text: Mar was an individual present on the planet Corellia during the Imperial Era. Mar witnessed the smuggler Remy meet with fellow smuggler Sana Starros at the fish market. One day later, when General Vukorah of the Unbroken Clan attempted to learn about the Path engine that Remy had sold to Beol De'Rruyet, a member of the Unbroken Clan informed her that Mar had seen Remy with Starros.
